data.name: Tiny Tina's Wonderlands: Season Pass
data.detailed_description:
Keep the party going with the Tiny Tina's Wonderlands Season Pass:
  • Four content drops featuring fantastical boss fights and whimsical new challenges, set to be released after the game launches!
  • Pay tribute to your diamond-maned Queen with the Butt Stallion Pack Bonus Cosmetics, available on launch day
data.about_the_game:
Keep the party going with the Tiny Tina's Wonderlands Season Pass:
  • Four content drops featuring fantastical boss fights and whimsical new challenges, set to be released after the game launches!
  • Pay tribute to your diamond-maned Queen with the Butt Stallion Pack Bonus Cosmetics, available on launch day
data.short_description: Tiny Tina's Wonderlands Season Pass Includes: -Four content drops featuring fantastical boss fights and whimsical new challenges, set to be released after the game launches! -Butt Stallion Pack Bonus Cosmetics, available on launch day
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese*, Thai, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (latest service pack)
  • Processor: AMD FX-8350 (Intel i5-3570)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX470 (NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 4GB)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 75 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (latest service pack)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 5 2600 (Intel i7-4770)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 590 8GB (NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 75 GB available space
